zeus.name: Zeus
zeus.description: King of the gods, master of lightning and thunder.

poseidon.name: Poseidon
poseidon.description: God of the seas, earthquakes, and horses.

hades.name: Hades
hades.description: God of the underworld and the dead.

athena.name: Athena
athena.description: Goddess of wisdom, warfare, and crafts.

apollo.name: Apollo
apollo.description: God of the sun, music, poetry, and prophecy.

artemis.name: Artemis
artemis.description: Goddess of the hunt, wilderness, and the moon.

hermes.name: Hermes
hermes.description: Messenger of the gods, god of trade and thieves.

odin.name: Odin
odin.description: The All-Father, god of wisdom, war, and death.

thor.name: Thor
thor.description: God of thunder, wielder of Mjolnir.

freya.name: Freya
freya.description: Goddess of love, beauty, fertility, and war.

loki.name: Loki
loki.description: The trickster god, shapeshifter and master of lies.

baldur.name: Baldur
baldur.description: God of light, purity, beauty, and innocence.

tyr.name: Tyr
tyr.description: God of war and justice, the one-handed god.

heimdall.name: Heimdall
heimdall.description: Guardian of the rainbow bridge Bifrost.

frigg.name: Frigg
frigg.description: Queen of Asgard, goddess of marriage and motherhood.

ra.name: Ra
ra.description: The sun god, king of the gods in Egyptian mythology.

anubis.name: Anubis
anubis.description: God of mummification and the afterlife.

isis.name: Isis
isis.description: Goddess of magic, motherhood, and healing.

thoth.name: Thoth
thoth.description: God of wisdom, writing, and judgment.

hera.name: Hera
hera.description: Queen of the gods, goddess of marriage and family.

hestia.name: Hestia
hestia.description: Goddess of the hearth, home, and domestic life.

demeter.name: Demeter
demeter.description: Goddess of the harvest, agriculture, and fertility.

dionysus.name: Dionysus
dionysus.description: God of wine, celebration, and ecstasy.

hephaestus.name: Hephaestus
hephaestus.description: God of fire, metalworking, and crafts.

aphrodite.name: Aphrodite
aphrodite.description: Goddess of love, beauty, and pleasure.

persephone.name: Persephone
persephone.description: Queen of the underworld, goddess of spring and the dead.

jade_emperor.name: Jade Emperor
jade_emperor.description: Supreme ruler of heaven and all celestial beings.

dragon_king.name: Dragon King
dragon_king.description: King of dragons, ruler of seas and bringer of rain.

sun_wukong.name: Sun Wukong
sun_wukong.description: The Monkey King, immortal trickster and master of 72 transformations.

chang_e.name: Chang'e
chang_e.description: Moon goddess living in the lunar palace with her jade rabbit.

nezha.name: Nezha
nezha.description: Child deity warrior with incredible power and righteous fury.

guanyin.name: Guanyin
guanyin.description: Goddess of mercy and compassion, protector of all beings.

lei_gong.name: Lei Gong
lei_gong.description: God of thunder, punisher of evil and protector of justice.

guan_yu.name: Guan Yu
guan_yu.description: Deified general, god of war and loyalty.

perun.name: Perun
perun.description: Thunder god, wielder of lightning and protector of justice.

svarog.name: Svarog
svarog.description: Sky father, divine smith, and creator of cosmic order.

mokosh.name: Mokosh
mokosh.description: Mother Earth goddess, spinner of fate and giver of life.

veles.name: Veles
veles.description: God of the underworld, cattle, and ancient wisdom.

lada.name: Lada
lada.description: Goddess of love, beauty, and harmony.

domovoi.name: Domovoi
domovoi.description: Household protector spirit, guardian of home and hearth.

jormungandr.name: Jormungandr
jormungandr.description: The World Serpent, destined to fight Thor at Ragnarok.

fenrir.name: Fenrir
fenrir.description: The great wolf, bound until Ragnarok when he will devour Odin.

vidar.name: Vidar
vidar.description: The silent god of vengeance, destined to avenge Odin's death.

bragi.name: Bragi
bragi.description: God of poetry, wisdom, and eloquence.

osiris.name: Osiris
osiris.description: God of the underworld, judge of the dead, and resurrection.

horus.name: Horus
horus.description: Sky god, protector of pharaohs, and symbol of divine kingship.

bastet.name: Bastet
bastet.description: Cat goddess, protector of homes and pregnant women.

sobek.name: Sobek
sobek.description: Crocodile god of the Nile, protector and creator deity.

set.name: Set
set.description: God of chaos, storms, and the desert.

ptah.name: Ptah
ptah.description: Creator god, patron of craftsmen and architects.

sekhmet.name: Sekhmet
sekhmet.description: Lioness goddess of war, fire, and vengeance.

nephthys.name: Nephthys
nephthys.description: Goddess of death, mourning, and funeral rites.

brahma.name: Brahma
brahma.description: The Creator, first of the Hindu trinity.

vishnu.name: Vishnu
vishnu.description: The Preserver, maintainer of cosmic order.

shiva.name: Shiva
shiva.description: The Destroyer, lord of dance and meditation.

ganesha.name: Ganesha
ganesha.description: Remover of obstacles, patron of arts and sciences.

hanuman.name: Hanuman
hanuman.description: Monkey deity, devoted follower of Rama.

durga.name: Durga
durga.description: Warrior goddess, slayer of demons and protector of dharma.

lakshmi.name: Lakshmi
lakshmi.description: Goddess of wealth, fortune, and prosperity.

saraswati.name: Saraswati
saraswati.description: Goddess of knowledge, music, and the arts.

indra.name: Indra
indra.description: King of gods, lord of storms and rain.

kali.name: Kali
kali.description: Goddess of time, change, and destruction.

surya.name: Surya
surya.description: Sun god, bringer of light and life.

chandra.name: Chandra
chandra.description: Moon god, controller of tides and time.

dagda.name: Dagda
dagda.description: The Good God, master of all skills and keeper of the cauldron of plenty.

brigid.name: Brigid
brigid.description: Triple goddess of smithing, poetry, and healing.

lugh.name: Lugh
lugh.description: God of skill, crafts, and the harvest.

morrigan.name: Morrigan
morrigan.description: Phantom queen of war, fate, and death.

cernunnos.name: Cernunnos
cernunnos.description: Horned god of nature, fertility, and the wild hunt.

rhiannon.name: Rhiannon
rhiannon.description: Goddess of horses, birds, and the otherworld.

manannan.name: Manannan
manannan.description: Sea god, guardian of the otherworld.

belenus.name: Belenus
belenus.description: Shining sun god of light and healing.

nuada.name: Nuada
nuada.description: Silver-armed king of the Tuatha D Danann.

amaterasu.name: Amaterasu
amaterasu.description: Supreme sun goddess, ruler of the heavens.

susanoo.name: Susanoo
susanoo.description: God of storms and sea, Amaterasu's tempestuous brother.

tsukuyomi.name: Tsukuyomi
tsukuyomi.description: Moon god, ruler of the night.

inari.name: Inari
inari.description: Rice goddess, patron of agriculture and prosperity.

fujin.name: Fujin
fujin.description: Wind god, master of air currents.

benzaiten.name: Benzaiten
benzaiten.description: Goddess of music, eloquence, and flowing water.

hachiman.name: Hachiman
hachiman.description: God of war and divine protection.

tengu.name: Tengu
tengu.description: Mountain spirit, master of martial arts.

marduk.name: Marduk
marduk.description: King of gods, slayer of Tiamat and bringer of cosmic order.

tiamat.name: Tiamat
tiamat.description: Primordial goddess of chaos and salt water, mother of monsters.

enlil.name: Enlil
enlil.description: Lord of air and earth, controller of storms.

ereshkigal.name: Ereshkigal
ereshkigal.description: Queen of the underworld, ruler of the dead.

shamash.name: Shamash
shamash.description: Sun god of justice and law.

ishtar.name: Ishtar
ishtar.description: Goddess of love, beauty, and warfare.

nergal.name: Nergal
nergal.description: God of war, plague, and the underworld.

ninlil.name: Ninlil
ninlil.description: Goddess of grain and the wind.
